# **Tender Announcement: Stage 1 - Keltic Road Infrastructure Upgrades (East) - Cape Breton Highlands National Park**

**Tender Number:** 5P468-24-0014/A

**Due Date:** June 4, 2024, 1:00 am

**Description:** Parks Canada is soliciting tenders for a two-stage selection process to upgrade the Keltic Road infrastructure in Cape Breton Highlands National Park. This project consists of re-aligning a single-lane road and adjacent underground waterline, installing new culverts, fire hydrants, retaining walls, and wildlife guide walls and tunnels.

**Technical Requirements:**

* The project will involve minor vegetation clearing, excavation, underground utility pipe installation, road reconstruction, and landscaping.
* The existing road and waterline will be decommissioned at the extents of the new realignment.
* The contractor must provide all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillary services.

**Procurement Method:**

* Competitive - Open Bidding
* Two-envelope ITT with an Indigenous Participation Plan (IPP) and price evaluation component

**Eligibility and Qualifications:**

* Interested suppliers are invited to submit a bid in two stages: the first stage will evaluate the qualifications of all interested suppliers; the second stage will invite the qualified suppliers to provide a financial bid on the project.

**Special Instructions:**

* Bidders must submit their bid via fax or email as indicated in the solicitation document.
* Bidders will not be accepted if they submit their bid in-person or by courier.
* The only acceptable email address for responses to the bid solicitation is soumissionsami-bidsrpc@pc.gc.ca.

**Bidder Information:**

* Bidder must be able to provide all necessary materials, labor, equipment, and ancillary services.
* Bidder must have the necessary experience and qualifications to complete the project.
* Bidder must comply with all relevant federal and provincial regulations.

**Timeline:**

* Pre-qualification list will expire within 180 days or upon award of a contract, whichever is earlier.
* Contract must be completed by July 31, 2025.

**Documents:**

* Solicitation document and all associated documents are available on the Government of Canada tendering service at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.
* Addenda will be posted on the same website.

**Contact Information:**

* Contracting Authority: Sheldon Lalonde, sheldon.lalonde@
